plaintext: Some say life is the thing, but I prefer reading.
title: [125 points] A quote by Ruth Rendell has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode.

plaintext: I wonder if you can refuse to inherit the world.

plaintext: Life is just a game of Snakes and Ladders. Learn to befriend the snakes.

plaintext: But the cure for most obstacles is, Be decisive.

plaintext: You live but once; you might as well be amusing.

plaintext: Imitation is the sincerest form of television.

plaintext: In the absence of justice what is sovereignty but organized robbery
